Package de.htw.ai.loz.gpan.mac.adaptation

Interface DataHandler

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Streamable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MacDataHandler
    public interface DataHandler
extends Streamable
    Wraps functionalism's to transmit and receive data units over a channel.
    • Administrate access to channel at sending
    • Mapping synchronous and asynchronous responses to commands
    • Routing channel events
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Miles Lorenz

    • Method Summary

        startStreaming, stopStreaming

    • Method Detail

      • prepareStreaming

        DataHandler prepareStreaming​(java.util.concurrent.BlockingQueue<ChannelDataCmd> commandQueue,
                             java.util.concurrent.BlockingQueue<ChannelDataInd> eventQueue)
        Sets the queues for incoming and outgoing data units.
        Parameters:
        commandQueue - The queue where to enqueue commands
        eventQueue - The queue where to dequeue events
        Returns:
        this data handler

      • sendData

        ConfirmationResult sendData​(MacDataCmd cmd)
        Validate's, Enqueue's and monitor's the data units to transmit.
        Parameters:
        cmd - The data unit to transmit.
        Returns:
        A synchronous response for transmitting the data unit. Note, that this response only indicates the reception of a valid data unit on the next layer, the final transmit is confirmed asynchronously.

      • awaitConfirmation

        ConfirmationResult awaitConfirmation​(byte handleId)
        Blocks the process till an asynchronously confirmation arrived or a timeout occurred.
        Parameters:
        handleId - A index to map command and response.
        Returns:
        The result of the transmission.

      • awaitIndication

        MacDataInd awaitIndication()
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Blocks the process till a data indication arrived or a timeout occurred.
        Returns:
        a received data unit.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If interrupted.

      • reQueueIndication

        void reQueueIndication​(MacDataInd ind)
        Requeue's a received data unit.
        Parameters:
        ind - Received data unit to requeue.

      • getUnresolvedChannelDataIndications

        java.util.concurrent.BlockingQueue<ChannelDataInd> getUnresolvedChannelDataIndications()
        Exposes all unresolved channel events in a queue.
        Returns:
        The queue containing the unresolved channel events.

      • setName

        void setName​(java.lang.String name)
        Sets the identifying name
        Parameters:
        name - The name of this data handler.
